DOC.detailed_description: This randomize case-control trial . A total 300 HBV carrier inadequate vitamin D ( < 30 ng/mL ) level enrol . They randomly divide two group : one group receive vitamin D supplement ( 2000 IU/day ) 2 month another group control . The serum vitamin D , HBV DNA qHBsAg level measure baseline vitamin D supplement . Whether HBV DNA qHBsAg significant change vitamin D supplement determine .
